description:
Scotty’s field-proven flexible leash, now improved. The slip-on ring attachment has been replaced with a strap that threads back through itself, so it can be attached to one-piece paddles, fishing poles, or anything else you don’t want to lose in the water.

  • 1.8m phone-cord style leash self-retracts to reduce risk of entanglement
  • Swivels at both attachment points maximize mobility and eliminate twist tangles
  • Paddle attachment strap fits objects up to 3.8cm in diameter
name: Scotty Safety Leash with Flexcoil
